medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain has been present for 3 days, starting after a sausage in the morning. It was crampy and across the upper abdomen. He felt improved after pain medication and was discharged to home. A recurrence of upper abdominal pain occurred after eating a cookie with breakfast yesterday, which became more prominent.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of breast cancer; Father had CAD; Brother had skin cancer.
